description: Remove SessionManager from /session page and rename the page to /prompts. The page should only contain PromptingWorkflow since we now have a dedicated SessionsHub at /sessions for session management.
goal: Clean up after creating SessionsHub - eliminate duplicate session management UI and make the prompts page dedicated to prompting workflow only
requirements: Remove SessionManager component import and usage from the page
Update navigation links in sidebar to point to /prompts
Update page title, description, and metadata to reflect prompts focus
Update any route references from /session to /prompts
constraints: Don't delete SessionManager component file (might be used elsewhere)
No breaking changes to PromptingWorkflow functionality
